input.sentences: on the edge of town there is an abandoned rail station with old cars sitting on unused tracks .
the proud locomotive stands tall even as the grass overtakes the wheels and rails .
there are decades of different rail cars parked under a canopy that has long since disintegrated from the weather .
some say that you can hear the whistles blow late at night when a full moon hovers overhead .
the ghosts of the railway keep the cars alive even as humanity forgot them .
output.sentences: One of the very first trains to pass through our little town.
Another train that just passed throught town.
Newere prototype trains that will hopefully replace the old ones.
New train didnt work out, back to old faithful.
Everyone please come check out our new commuter cars.
